Description.Text: The scent of history permeates into your soul and body in ODDA HOTEL and a journey to the history starts As restored faithfully to historical heritage of Beyoglu's 118-year building's architecture ODDA HOTEL takes you a quite different world for peace within the city that you need. Adopting as a principle to have you feel at home, ODDA HOTEL specially considers every detail for you. Making its guests at home, ODDA HOTEL renders a unique service for those who would like to have fun outside but a peaceful environment inside away from stress, for various events from holidays to business trips and entertaining weekend getaways. While giving priority to your comfort with various bedding and pillow options ODDA HOTEL presents flavor and health together with its 100% ecological breakfast. There are 28 rooms in total of which 5 are penthouse, 2 are suit and 21 are deluxe; mini bar, air conditioner, LCD TV, wireless internet network and 24-hour special room service are available in all 24-hours Concierge services, Airport transfer service, Free high speed (Wi-Fi) internet Access, Multi-lingual hotel staff, Fully Business equipment, Valet Parking, Luggage Packing & Unpacking service, Early Bird Buffet Breakfast, Manager on duty 24 hours a day, Daily Laundry and dry-cleaning services, Express check out in suit. Airport transfer service from Ataturk Airport 35 Euro/Sabha Gokcen Airport 70 Euro. Also ask the reception daily city tours and Cappadocia,Ephesus,Bursa,Pamukkale Tours fee. hotel also offers dry cleaning, lobby, reception and secretarial services for hotel guests.

It locates within 50 m to Istiklal Street, 500 m to Taksim Square, in the surrounding of Pera, at the heart of business, shopping, entertainment, culture and history and collocates with Nevizade Street and Mini Beyoglu.

Single Room - Single Room offers one double bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, clothes dryer, color TV, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. 24-hours Concierge services, Airport transfer service, Free high speed (wi-fi) internet Access, Multi-lingual hotel staff, Fully Business equipment, Luggage Packing & Unpacking service, Early Bird Buffet Breakfast, Manager on duty 24 hours a day, Daily Laundry and dry-cleaning services.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers two twin beds or king bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, clothes dryer, color TV, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. 24-hours concierge services, airport transfer service, free high speed (WiFi) internet access, multilingual hotel staff, fully business equipment, luggage packing & unpacking service, early bird buffet breakfast, manager on duty 24 hours a day, daily laundry and dry-cleaning services.
